Croquetes.name: Croquetes
Croquetes.level: The perfect food form ever existed, ready to be consumed on the go or at home, infinite flavours with infinite possibilities

Kebab.name: Kebab
Kebab.level: Most recurrent option when searching for something to eat at 3:00 at the morning

Hamburguesa.name: Hamburguesa
Hamburguesa.level: Preferably consumed at restaurants with a perfect one for each consumer, can be consumed on the go

Pizza.name: Pizza
Pizza.level: Perfect for sharing with other people and combine diferent pizza flavours with them, should only be consumed while sit on a table

Patates.name: Patates
Patates.level: Easy to share, easy to access them, enjoyed by everyone with an amazing feature that allows to introduce sausaces into them
